snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: Infection Game Type
snippet.description:
Follow on twitter for updates: twitter.com/b0tster
Music by The Noble Demon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbD2ZYISkD0

Hey all! Wanted to show off one of the many new game types that have been created for the game: Infection (also known as Plague)! It's similar to infection game types in other games (like Halo) where the match involves a single infected player who must infect everyone else to win.

I know this game has been in development for awhile (it's less "feature creep" and more "feature sprint" if you know what I mean 😅), but if I were to lay all the content out...

7/16 tracks finished (the next track is in the middle of development!)
7/10 racers finished
5/8 game types finished

This doesn't include planned expansions to the code base, but in terms of raw content we are over halfway finished!

On top of content creation, I have also polished up the gameplay quite a lot, primarily AI, which you can see in this video as they efficiently hunt down their enemies.
